abstract: Letter by Rep Joe Pitts responds to Oct 20 editorial criticizing controversial abortion legislation moving through Congress.
snippet: Representative Joe Pitts, Republican of Pennsylvania, writes about emergency care and abortion.
lead_paragraph: Representative Joe Pitts, Republican of Pennsylvania, writes about emergency care and abortion.

headline.main: E.R. Care and Abortion: A G.O.P. Congressman’s View
